Scriptal.Name: Check Table Key-Value
Scriptal.Description: Retrieves a value in a table at the specified key/index and compares it to a value.

Choice.Name: Table
Choice.Description: The table to be that stores the value.

Choice.Name: Key
Choice.Description: The key (or index) of the value to be retrieved.

Choice.Name: Expected Value
Choice.Description: The value to compare against. Set to "nil" to check that a key does not exist in the table.
